original_text: And Samuel answered Saul, and said, I am the seer: go up before me unto the high place; for ye shall eat with me to day, and to morrow I will let thee go, and will tell thee all that is in thine heart.
korean_text: 사무엘이 사울에게 대답하여 이르되 내가 선견자이니라 너는 내 앞서 산당으로 올라가라 너희가 오늘 나와 함께 먹을 것이요 아침에는 내가 너를 보내되 네 마음에 있는 것을 다 네게 말하리라

sentences.original_text: and said, I am the seer:
go up before me unto the high place;
for ye shall eat with me to day,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 오늘 나와 함께 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and to morrow I will let thee go,
and will tell thee all that is in thine heart.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 마음에 있는 모든 것을 네게 말하리라
